traits.name: (Controller) Distraction
traits.detail: Halve your attack damage to grant advantage to the next attack roll made against the target.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.detail: At the start of your turn, you can gain advantage on all melee attacks you make for that turn. However, all attacks against you gain advantage until the start of your next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: The maenad makes three dagger attacks.  If any of them hit, the next creature to attack the target has advantage on its first attack.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 6 (1d4+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Wild Dance (recharge 6)
actions.detail:
The maenad performs a crazed dance. Any creature within 30 feet of the maenad (including other maenads) must make a [dc-secondary] Charisma saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature goes into a frenzied dance (save ends). While in the frenzied dance, the creature can't take reactions and rolls a d10 at the start of each of its turns to determine its behavior.
1-2. The creature dances and takes 7 (1d12) psychic damage.
3-5. The creature attacks the nearest ally.
6-8. The creature attacks the nearest enemy.
9-10. The creature can act and move normally.
